title: Vegetarian vegetable soup
ingredients: ['1 potato, diced', '1 turnip, diced', '1 leek, chopped', '3 carrots, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '3 tomatoes, quartered', '2 cloves garlic', '2 vegetable stock cubes', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 pinch dried mixed herbs', '1 pinch chilli flakes', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 pinch salt']
